amendment.description: Amendment requires an annual report to Congress from the Secretary of Energy regarding counterintelligence and security practices at national laboratories.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 5 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to require the Secretary of Energy report to Congress on an annual basis regarding the counterintelligence and security practices at the national laboratories.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
